languages.text: "Жара, влажность, агрессивная фауна — так и тянет спросить, что среди навигаторов считается уродливым и опасным".
languages.translation_comment:
Resolved the crisis on Janus.
Cassia: "It is sad that the beautiful and lush Janus has been overcome by such grievous calamities. The world is... very beautiful."

languages.text: "Heat, humidity, vicious fauna — I am tempted to ask what passes for ugly and dangerous among you Navigators."
languages.translation_comment:
Resolved the crisis on Janus.
Cassia: "It is sad that the beautiful and lush Janus has been overcome by such grievous calamities. The world is... very beautiful."
languages.original_text: "Жара, влажность, агрессивная фауна — так и тянет спросить, что среди навигаторов считается уродливым и опасным".

traits.locale_text: "The heat, the humidity, the vicious fauna — I am tempted to ask what passes for ugly and dangerous among Navigators."
"The heat, the humidity, the vicious fauna — I am tempted to ask what passes for ugly and dangerous among Navigators."
"Heat, humidity, vicious fauna — I am tempted to ask what passes for ugly and dangerous among you Navigators."

"Heat, humidity, vicious fauna — I am tempted to ask what passes for ugly and dangerous among you Navigators."
"Heat, humidity, vicious fauna — I am tempted to ask what passes for ugly and dangerous among you Navigators."

languages.text: 「熱さ、湿気、凶暴な動物たち…あなたがた航宙士たちの間で醜く危険とされるものは一体何なのか、つい尋ねたくなってしまいますね」
languages.original_text: "Heat, humidity, vicious fauna — I am tempted to ask what passes for ugly and dangerous among you Navigators."

traits.locale_text: 「熱さ、湿気、凶暴な動物たち…あなたがた航宙士たちの間で醜く危険とされるものは一体何なのか、つい尋ねたくなってしまいますね」

languages.text: "Hitze, Feuchtigkeit, bösartige Fauna – ich bin fast versucht, Euch zu fragen, was bei Euch Navigatoren als hässlich und gefährlich gilt."
languages.original_text: "Heat, humidity, vicious fauna — I am tempted to ask what passes for ugly and dangerous among you Navigators."

traits.locale_text: "Hitze, Feuchtigkeit, bösartige Fauna – ich bin fast versucht, Euch zu fragen, was bei Euch Navigatoren als hässlich und gefährlich gilt."

languages.text: «Calor, humedad, fauna hostil... Me siento tentado de preguntar qué considera un Navegante que es feo y peligroso».
languages.original_text: "Heat, humidity, vicious fauna — I am tempted to ask what passes for ugly and dangerous among you Navigators."

traits.locale_text: «Calor, humedad, fauna hostil... Me siento tentado de preguntar qué considera un Navegante que es feo y peligroso».

languages.text: “炎热、潮湿、凶暴的动物……我不禁很好奇：在你们导航者的眼中，究竟什么东西才算得上丑陋、危险呢？”
languages.original_text: "Heat, humidity, vicious fauna — I am tempted to ask what passes for ugly and dangerous among you Navigators."

traits.locale_text: “炎热、潮湿、凶暴的动物……我不禁很好奇：在你们导航者的眼中，究竟什么东西才算得上丑陋、危险呢？”

languages.text: "Sıcak, nem, berbat bir fauna... Siz Rotacılar için neyin çirkin ve tehlikeli sayıldığını sormamak için zor duruyorum."
languages.original_text: "Heat, humidity, vicious fauna — I am tempted to ask what passes for ugly and dangerous among you Navigators."

traits.locale_text: "Sıcak, nem, berbat bir fauna... Siz Rotacılar için neyin çirkin ve tehlikeli sayıldığını sormamak için zor duruyorum."

languages.original_text: "Heat, humidity, vicious fauna — I am tempted to ask what passes for ugly and dangerous among you Navigators."

languages.text: « La chaleur, l'humidité, une faune agressive... J'ai presque envie de vous demander ce que les navigateurs considèrent comme laid et dangereux. »
languages.original_text: "Heat, humidity, vicious fauna — I am tempted to ask what passes for ugly and dangerous among you Navigators."

traits.locale_text: « La chaleur, l'humidité, une faune agressive... J'ai presque envie de vous demander ce que les navigateurs considèrent comme laid et dangereux. »
